scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run compile:metaModelTool && npm run generate:metaModel && npm run generate:metaModelSchema
scripts.all:publish: git clean -xfd . && npm install && npm run compile:publish && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run compile:metaModelTool && npm run generate:metaModel && npm run generate:metaModelSchema
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "⛔ Can only publish from a secure pipeline ⛔" && node ../build/npm/fail
scripts.webpack:test: cd ../types && npm run compile:esm && cd ../protocol && node ../build/bin/webpack --mode none --config ./src/browser/test/webpack.config.js
scripts.webpack:test:silent: cd ../types && npm run compile:esm && cd ../protocol && node ../build/bin/webpack --no-stats --mode none --config ./src/browser/test/webpack.config.js
